ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { RestResponse: items: payload.items map { XI_Denominacion: $.XI_Denominacion, XI_Logistic_Centre: $.XI_Logistic_Centre, XI_Lote: $.XI_Lote, XI_Movement_Type: $.XI_Movement_Type, XI_PEP: $.XI_PEP, XI_Warehouse: $.XI_Warehouse, XI_macn: $.XI_macn, inventoryId: $.inventoryId, inventoryType: $.inventoryType, quantity: $.quantity, resourceId: $.resourceId, serialNumber: $.serialNumber, status: $.status }, totalResults: payload.totalResults, detail: payload.detail, status: payload.status, title: payload.title }
